The '''Warehouse Inventory Records''' are an interactable found in the [[Desert of Hadramaveth]], [[Sumeru]]. It contains records of what Fatui professor [[Froderock Fronkonsteen]] ordered from an unknown warehouse.

==Location==
<gallery>
File:Interactable Warehouse Inventory Records Location.png|Location
File:Interactable Warehouse Inventory Records Location Context.png|Location Context
</gallery>

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Warehouse Inventory Records:''' ...Froderock Fronkonsteen's order of one batch of Energy Transformation Capacitors, three batches of Fire-Water, and three batches of sweet Fontaine wine has reached the warehouse and awaits further orders.
:'''Warehouse Inventory Records:''' ...Professor Froderock cannot function if he does not drink wine, so we must take care to ensure that the six batches of alcohol remain in good condition...
{{Dialogue End}}
